      • calcLifeInsurance

        public double calcLifeInsurance(int totalMonths)
                         throws IncorrectMonthException
        This method calculates the life insurance value for the whole family. If totalMonths is 42, which is equivalent to 3 years and 6 months. The method should return the sum of the number of years times the return value of the calcYearlyInstallment() method and the number of months times the return value of the calcMontlyInstallment() method.
        Specified by:
        calcLifeInsurance in interface Health
        Overrides:
        calcLifeInsurance in class HealthInsurance
        Parameters:
        totalMonths - - The number of months.
        Returns:
        Returns the value of life insurance calculation.
        Throws:
        IncorrectMonthException - - If the totalMonths is less than 0.

      • calcMontlyInstallment

        public double calcMontlyInstallment()
        This method calculates the monthly installment value for the whole family. If the person's age in a family is less than or equal to 10.00 or greater than or equal to 60.00, then the method should calculate the difference of the monthly installment and the 20% of the monthly installment; else no % should be given on the monthly installment. The above calculation gives the value of monthly installment based on age of a person. Next, pass the above value to the calcFamilyDiscount() method to get the final monthly installment value of a person based on the number of persons in a family.
        Returns:
        Returns the value of monthly installment calculation.

      • calcYearlyInstallment

        public double calcYearlyInstallment()
        This method calculates the yearly installment value for the whole family. If the person's age in a family is less than or equal to 10.00 or greater than or equal to 60.00, then the method should calculate the difference of the yearly installment and the 20% of the yearly installment; else no % should be given on the yearly installment. The above calculation gives the value of yearly installment based on age of a person. Next, pass the above value to the calcFamilyDiscount() method to get the final yearly installment value of a person based on the number of persons in a family.
        Returns:
        double type

      • calcExemption

        public double calcExemption(int totalMonths)
                     throws IncorrectMonthException
        This method calculates the exemption amount value of the whole family. The method should return the difference of the calcLifeInsurance() method value in it's super class times the number of persons and the value of calcLifeInsurance() method.
        Parameters:
        totalMonths - - The number of months.
        Returns:
        Returns the value of Exemption calculation.
        Throws:
        IncorrectMonthException - - If the totalMonths is less than 0.

      • calcFamilyDiscount

        public double calcFamilyDiscount(double valueBasedOnAge)
        This method calculates the family discount value for the whole family. If the total family members count is equal to 4, then the method should calculate the difference of the valueBasedOnAge and 15% of the valueBasedOnAge; else if the total family members count is greater than or equal to 5, then the method should return the difference of the valueBasedOnAge and 20% of the valueBasedOnAge. If the total family members count is not in the above specific range then the method should return the valueBasedOnAge;
        Parameters:
        valueBasedOnAge - - The value based on the age.
        Returns:
        double type

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        The string representation consists of the familyMembers array, calcMontlyInstallment() and the calcYearlyInstallment(). Please refer to the word document for the sample output.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string representation of the object.
